location.zh-cn: 陕西省西安市新城区新城大院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省的省级国家行政机关，属于正省部级行政单位。1968年5月至1979年12月期间，其职能由陕西省革命委员会取代。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China, with a provincial-ministerial administrative level. From May 1968 to December 1979, its functions were replaced by the Shaanxi Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任陕西省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Governor of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，陕西省人民政府首任主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, the first Chairman of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority during the initial period of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间陕西省的权力机构，取代了陕西省人民政府。
description.en: The governing body of Shaanxi Province during the Cultural Revolution, which replaced the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任陕西省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任陕西省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任陕西省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Executive Vice Governor of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任陕西省人民政府副省长、省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as Vice Governor of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province and Director of the Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省人民政府的组成部门，主管全省公安工作。
description.en: A component department of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government, responsible for public security work throughout the province.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省西安市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Xi'an City, Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 陕西省人民政府在业务上接受中华人民共和国国务院的直接领导。
description.en: The People's Government of Shaanxi Province is under the direct leadership of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in terms of business operations.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省人民政府是陕西省人民代表大会的执行机关，由其选举产生并向其负责。
description.en: The People's Government of Shaanxi Province is the executive organ of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Congress, elected by and responsible to it.

relationships.target: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 陕西省人民政府在党务上接受中共陕西省委的领导。
description.en: The People's Government of Shaanxi Province accepts the leadership of the CPC Shaanxi Provincial Committee in party affairs.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 根据中央人民政府的命令，陕西省人民政府于1950年1月10日成立，并任命了其主要领导。
description.en: On the order of the Central People's Government, the People's Government of Shaanxi Province was established on January 10, 1950, and its main leaders were appointed.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，陕西省革命委员会成立以取代原省政府。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the Shaanxi Provincial Revolutionary Committee was established to replace the original provincial government.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省革命委员会在1968年至1979年间取代了陕西省人民政府的职能。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Revolutionary Committee replaced the functions of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province from 1968 to 1979.

description.zh-cn: 被中央人民政府任命为陕西省人民政府首任主席。
description.en: Appointed by the Central People's Government as the first Chairman of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 兼任陕西省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Concurrently serves as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省公安厅是陕西省人民政府的组成部门。
description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Public Security Department is a component department of the People's Government of Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 西安市人民政府是陕西省人民政府下属的地方政府。
description.en: The Xi'an Municipal People's Government is a local government subordinate to the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government.
